story1.title: Welcome to SuProtect!
story1.message: Your comprehensive app protection solution. Keep your applications secure and safe from various threats.

story2.title: Features
story2.message:
Discover powerful features:

• Security Protection
• Threat Detection
• Data Encryption
• Real-time Monitoring

story3.title: Tips
story3.message:
Best Practices:

• Keep your app updated
• Use strong passwords
• Enable all security features
• Regular security checks
